introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is はかせ, which you will often hear in academic, scholarly, and educational contexts. For example, a "はかせ" might be called upon to share their expertise during a university lecture or to present findings at a research conference.
meaning_explanation_english: The word はかせ means "a doctor or doctorate holder," typically referring to someone who has achieved the highest level of education in a specific field. It emphasizes academic and scholarly expertise.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 教授 : きょうじゅ : professor
専門家 : せんもんか : specialist
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word はかせ are "きょうじゅ" and "せんもんか." "きょうじゅ" refers to a professor, typically someone who teaches at a university level, and "せんもんか" denotes a specialist or expert in a particular area, rather than holding an academic title. Both differ from はかせ based on the specific roles they fulfill outside the realm of completing a doctorate degree.
antonyms: 初心者 : しょしんしゃ : beginner
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the word はかせ is "しょしんしゃ," which means "beginner." While はかせ connotes a high level of expertise and academic accomplishment, "しょしんしゃ" refers to someone just starting out or learning something new, reflecting a basic or foundational level of knowledge.

example_sentences.furigana: 博士(はかせ)の学者(がくしゃ)です。

translations.EN: I am a scholar with a doctorate.
translations.ID: Saya adalah seorang sarjana dengan gelar doktor.
translations.ES: Soy un erudito con un doctorado.
translations.VI: Tôi là một học giả có học vị tiến sĩ.
translations.FR: Je suis un érudit avec un doctorat.
translations.BN: আমি একজন পণ্ডিত, যার ডক্টরেট ডিগ্রি আছে।
translations.ZH: 我是拥有博士学位的学者。
translations.TL: Isa akong iskolar na may doktorado.
translations.MY: ကျွန်တော်က ဒေါက်တာဘွဲ့ရ ပညာရှင်တစ်ယောက်ပါ။
translations.HI: मैं एक विद्वान हूँ जो डॉक्टरेट की डिग्री रखता हूँ।
translations.FA: من یک دانشمند با مدرک دکترا هستم.

example_sentences.kanji: 田中さんは博士号をとりました。
example_sentences.furigana: 田中(たなか)さんは博士号(はかせごう)をとりました。

translations.ES: El Sr. Tanaka recibió su doctorado.
translations.VI: Ông Tanaka đã nhận bằng tiến sĩ.
translations.FR: M. Tanaka a reçu son doctorat.
translations.BN: মিঃ তানাকা তার পিএইচডি ডিগ্রী লাভ করেছেন।
translations.ZH: 田中先生获得了博士学位。
translations.TL: Nakuha ni G. Tanaka ang doctorate niya.
translations.MY: ခင်ဗျာ.တာနာကာသည် သူ၏ ဘွဲ့ရပြီ။
translations.HI: मिस्टर तनाका ने अपनी डॉक्टरेट पूरी की।
translations.AR: حصل السيد تاناكا على شهادة الدكتوراه.
translations.FA: آقای تاناکا دکترای خود را دریافت کرد.

example_sentences.kanji: 博士館へ行きましょう。
example_sentences.furigana: 博士(はかせ)館(かん)へ行(い)きましょう。

translations.EN: Let's go to the Doctor's House.
translations.ES: Vamos a la casa del doctor.
translations.VI: Hãy đi đến Nhà của Bác sĩ.
translations.FR: Allons à la maison du docteur.
translations.TL: Pumunta tayo sa Bahay ng Doktor.

example_sentences.kanji: 博士は論文を書きます。
example_sentences.furigana: 博士(はかせ)は論文(ろんぶん)を書(か)きます。

translations.TL: Ang doktor ay nagsusulat ng tesis.
translations.MY: ဒါက်တာသည် နိဒါန်းရေးသားနေသည်။
translations.HI: डॉक्टर एक शोध प्रबंध लिखते हैं।

example_sentences.kanji: 私は大学で博士生活をしています。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)は大学(だいがく)で博士生活(はかせせいかつ)をしています。

translations.EN: I am living a life as a PhD student at the university.
translations.ID: Saya menjalani kehidupan sebagai mahasiswa doktor di universitas.
translations.ES: Estoy viviendo una vida como estudiante de doctorado en la universidad.
translations.VI: Tôi đang sống như một nghiên cứu sinh tiến sĩ tại trường đại học.
translations.FR: Je mène une vie de doctorant à l'université.
translations.NE: म विश्वविद्यालयमा पीएचडी विद्यार्थीको रूपमा बाँचिरहेको छु।
translations.BN: আমি বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ে পিএইচডি ছাত্র হিসেবে জীবন যাপন করছি।
translations.ZH: 我在大学过着博士生活。
translations.KO: 저는 대학교에서 박사 생활을 하고 있습니다.
translations.TL: Nabubuhay ako bilang isang estudyanteng PhD sa unibersidad.
translations.MY: ကျွန်တော်က တက္ကသိုလ်မှာ ဒေါက်တာဘဝနေထိုင်ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: मैं विश्वविद्यालय में पीएचडी का छात्र हूँ।
translations.AR: أنا أعيش حياة طالب دكتوراه في الجامعة.
translations.FA: من به عنوان دانشجوی دکترا در دانشگاه زندگی می‌کنم.

expert.MY: ဒေါက်တာ: ကျွမ်းကျင်သူ

pitch and length marks.ES: Doctor: marcas de tono y longitud
pitch and length marks.VI: Giáo sư: dấu hiệu cao độ và độ dài
pitch and length marks.FR: Docteur : marques de hauteur et de longueur
pitch and length marks.KO: 박사: 음 높이 및 길이 표시
pitch and length marks.TL: Doktor: pitch at haba na marka
pitch and length marks.MY: ဆရာဝန်: ရွယ်ချိန်နှင့် အရှည်မှတ်ကြားချက်များ
pitch and length marks.HI: डॉक्टर: पिच और लंबाई के चिह्न

parts_of_speech: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
